
| Oracle | Zad 1 | Zad 2 |
|-------|-------|-------|
| simple |3.637s |28.757s|
|Prawdziwa |16.628s|7m36.500s |

# Zad 1a

All you need is the encryption key, the eavesdropped ciphertext,
and the oracle. The oracle needs the private key, so in fact the key
we read here is private. Pretend you do not have access to the private
part!
PrivRSAkey(keyBits=512, keyBytes=64, n=7673250590588277816184910214431581025119938749441770437978530032223338416160481376698036791255871586122552989581392838804876583655162332880337519885716221, e=65537, p=66945259272238095825701556218206268849353161298773402620033794794602564028461, q=114619775530100023691015036281355054275709943070282935949176547979165253894161, d=4623596835716176983400859123363949138379638695934441835844975372270620169586191610274823817909801391545871948394326784296092928479061635549512375744345473)
This is your key of size 512 bits (64 bytes):
n = 7673250590588277816184910214431581025119938749441770437978530032223338416160481376698036791255871586122552989581392838804876583655162332880337519885716221
e = 65537
ciphertext = 157737342100514692629765866418015535796619211466525954266251813887545928286789674418716261907358783492850100899793803985117913427680154551188126833883785
oracle = <bound method Oracle.simpleOracle of <rsa.oracle.Oracle object at 0x7fb781b452b0>>
Now is YOUR turn!
Znaleziono wiadomość: 442367218728876472230609233312195735328284696671001419974429793146120441287920702598116577830878011468070211319834503644210403986320942925924665288481
Liczba zapytań: 6253
Odszyfrowana wiadomość: This Bleichenbacher attack is really something!

real    0m3.637s
user    0m3.629s
sys     0m0.004s

and the oracle. The oracle needs the private key, so in fact the key
we read here is private. Pretend you do not have access to the private
part!
